alert.note: Alert for Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Castle Country; South Central Utah; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 11 at 1:44PM MDT until August 11 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Castle Country, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80, Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity and South Central Utah. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in debris flows on area burn scars, flooding of slot canyons, normally dry washes, slickrock areas, and other low-lying flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Castle Country; South Central Utah; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
